name: Light Dash (ParkerAllen)
description:
A quick little 2D platforming game that consists of a grand total of 2 whole sprites, a dot  and a square!

Gameplay:

  •  The goal is to complete the course in the quickest time possible, currently my best time is 19.652 seconds.
  • Use walls to change direction
  • Ohh, by the way you can't directly see the platforms (^ v ^ )/ good luck
